title: Senior Executive Influencer Marketing
content:
Established in 1981 with a single store in the Northwest of England, the JD Group is a leading omni-channel retailer of Sports Fashion, Outdoors and Gyms with over 60,000 colleagues and over 3,400 stores across several retail fascias in over 30 markets around the world.
JD Italy counts around 50 stores with over 1,700 employees.
 
Senior Executive Influencer Marketing, Italy
Department: Marketing Department
Location: Milan
 
Role Overview:
We are seeking for an exceptional Sr. Executive Influencer Marketing, to support in executing JD brand’s global marketing vision across the Italian market. To advance the JD brand, maximising awareness and connection to the consumers whilst driving efficiency across the territory.
The Senior Executive Influencer Marketing will will play a critical role in executing our brand's influencer marketing strategy and creating an exciting portfolio of talents that are the right fit for our brand.
 
The ideal candidate for this role is a dynamic, data-driven, and creative individual who has a passion for influencer marketing and understanding of the Italian market. You are a natural relationship builder with a keen eye for talent, and you know how to identify influencers who align with our brand's image and values. You have a deep understanding of social media platforms and the latest industry trends and insights, and you are able to leverage these insights to optimize your output. You are also an excellent communicator with strong organizational skills, and you are able to manage multiple projects simultaneously while maintaining attention to detail.
 
The JD Marketing team puts the consumer at the heart of what we do to develop campaigns, content, partnerships, activations & events that elevate the JD brand and maximise consumer impact.
 
 
Key Responsibilities

Work closely with the Senior Manager Influencer and Activations and EU marketing team to align the influencer strategy with the overall marketing strategy and goals.
Execute the influencer marketing strategy for our brand in the Italian market.
Identify, develop, and maintain relationships with influencers who align with our brand's values, tone of voice, and target audience
Manage all aspects of influencer collaborations, from outreach and negotiations to campaign planning and execution
Keep up-to-date with the latest industry trends and insights to inform our influencer marketing strategy
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including social media, PR, and marketing, to ensure a consistent brand image and message across all channels
Work closely with the creative agency to brief and guide the development of high-quality content that is aligned with the brand's objectives and resonates with our target audience, ensuring a consistent brand image and messaging across all influencer activations.
Planning and budget management of several internal and external projects.
Define and track KPIs for influencer marketing campaigns, and provide regular reports and insights to the team
Support the 3PB team in working with brands and third parties on promoting campaigns and competitions in the market;
Share best practices and learnings with the wider marketing team and provide guidance on influencer marketing to local teams across Europe

 
 
Key Relationships

EU marketing teams
EU Social media and Influencer teams
EU E-com team
Global 3PB and Influencer teams
External agencies and vendors
Legal, Compliance & Procurement team
JD Creative Studio

 
 
Skills/Experience/Knowledge Needed:

3+ years of experience in influencer marketing, preferably in the Italian market
Experience managing influencer collaborations from start to finish, including negotiation, contracting, campaign planning, execution, and performance measurement
A deep understanding of social media platforms and how they can be leveraged in influencer marketing campaigns
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships with a diverse range of individuals
Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously

· Knowledge of influencer marketing and omni-channel regulations and best practices.

Knowledge of the sports & lifestyle and youth culture
Team player with solid interpersonal, networking and negotiating skills.
Fluent in Italian and English, with excellent written and verbal communication skills in both languages
A plus: existing strong network of influencer relationships in the Italian market
